20101202013808.778|20101202013809.889|CCO|REGARDLESS OF WHAT TAX BRACKET
20101202013809.889|20101202013811.000|CCO|YOU'RE IN, YOU'D GET 15% OF YOUR

20101202013812.429|20101202013813.857|CCO|TAXES.
